article.author: Manulife
article.title: Alycia - Saved by Travel Insurance
article.lead: Alycia tells her tale of what happened when things went wrong on a trip and how Manulife was there to help.

article.author: Club Med
article.title: Club Med | Let's Travel Again
article.lead: Club Med is Ready When You Are
article.body: Club Med’s top-rated all-inclusive resorts are reopening in time to provide with safe and unforgettable experiences. Let’s Travel Again!
